website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1 delivers everything casual tablet users will need, but it's all tied down to an inflated price tag that makes comparable options more attractive to budget-conscious shoppers.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1 is lightweight and comfortable to use, with a stylishly thin design that provides sufficient grip support
Performance is fast for simple tasks and it includes a ton of software perks
cons: $499 is an expensive starting price for any tablet
When multi-tasking, performance significantly lags with random freezes and unexplainable app crashes

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: this will be my second tab pro i handed down my last one in great working condition there a great tablet everything you could ask for
customer_reviews.author: Nate ATx

customer_reviews.title: Very old version.
customer_reviews.text: This battery didn't even last 1 hour. Not compatible with YouTube TV
customer_reviews.author: Carvel Anthony Garriques

customer_reviews.title: Operation iffy
customer_reviews.text: Tablet looked good but did not work very well, the WiFi just kept turning on and off about every 10 seconds,wouldn't give me enough time to enter password,would get first couple digits in and it would just shut off,poof. The touch screen was iffy also, some spots were very sensitive and others you had to pound on it, returned item and bought new,I recommend you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 tablets and both horrible, actually phone carrier would turn it on is old model and didn't come with any place for sim card, mis lead cover to protect did nt fit and way too much to return
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Everything works perfect and smooth but the only thing is that charging ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works perfect and smooth but the only thing is that charging time is between 4.5-5hrs...True is that device will stay ON for LONG period of time but... Otherwise it meets my expectations and there is a lot of helpfull features and the resolution is simply AWESOME....Definitely will recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: And the display is brilliant! I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1 is everything I expected and more. Email and photo sharing are a seamless operation with my Android phone. And the display is brilliant! I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Noticeably faster than the regular Galaxy Tab, and I *love* the multiple users.
customer_reviews.author: deirdrebeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet i have ever owned. Much better then my wives ipad air.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Android tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love using it, the size and how perfectly it is to take along to do research anywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpasgirl

customer_reviews.title: Can't get any updates for 4.4os
customer_reviews.text: 4.4 KitKat no longer have any updates or support, and most of the apps are not going to be supported or updated, except games and the ones that don't communicate with any services. Majority of my apps are no longer of use, and I have to wonder at this price if you have double checked the os you've listed
customer_reviews.author: who's your Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: Be very easy on the headphone jack. Mine failed after 6 months. Otherwise this has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1 16GB T520 Wi-Fi Android Tablet PC - Black
feature_bullets: 10.1" Super clear LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors
8 MP (3264 x 2448 pixels) camera w/ autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging, face and smile detection
Secondary 2 MP front facing camera w/ 1080p HD video capture
Quad-core 1.9 GHz Cortex-A15 & quad-core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A7 processors
